message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. How about we meet in the middle at $135? I'm willing to make a compromise to get this deal done.
I appreciate the compromise, but $135 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $125, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand that $125 is your final offer, but I'm still not willing to sell at that price. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $130? I'm willing to give a bit more to get this deal done.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to go up to $128, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand that $128 is your highest offer, but I'm still not willing to sell at that price. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $132? I'm willing to give a bit more to get this deal done.

I'm getting a bit frustrated that we're not meeting in the middle. I'm willing to go up to $127, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I think that's a fair price for this product. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand that $127 is your highest offer, but I'm still not willing to sell at that price. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $129? I'm willing to give a bit more to get this deal done.

I've made it clear that I'm willing to pay up to $127, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I think that's a fair price for this product. I'm not going to make any more offers, so if you're not willing to meet me at $127, I'll have to consider buying from John for $100.
